alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Menominee; Oconto; Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:58PM CDT until June 15 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Menominee County in northeastern Wisconsin... Eastern Waupaca County in northeastern Wisconsin... Oconto County in northeastern Wisconsin... Northwestern Outagamie County in northeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Langlade County in north central Wisconsin... Central Shawano County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 557 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Neopit to near Big Smokey Falls to near New London, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... White Lake, South Branch and Big Smokey Falls around 605 PM CDT. Gardner Dam Scout Camp around 610 PM CDT. Mountain and Bear Paw Scout Camp around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Navarino Wildlife Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Langlade; Menominee; Oconto; Outagamie; Shawano; Waupaca
